name: David Ramirez
text: This makes me think about Frank Miller's Dark Knight comics when Batman was already old. Mickey Rourke would be awesome for Old Bitter Bruce Wayne/Batman.    ...I do have to wonder what they'll do for Batman in a movie with Superman. Surely they can't have him be the Nolan-style Batman... He'd be pointless. He'd have to be ultra-genius Batman from the Justice League comics/ cartoons.
